editor.title: Editor type
editor.description: Editor widget to test completion in

path.title: Path to document
path.description: Optional path to an existing document of specified editor type. When empty (default) a new temporary file will be created.

setup.title: Editor setup for completion
setup.description: How should the editor be populated?

tokenCount.title: Token count
tokenCount.description: The number of completion items to generate

tokenSize.title: Token size
tokenSize.description: The number characters in each token

anyOf.title: I will provide a custom text

setupText.title: Trigger code
setupText.description: Text to enter into the editor. Last line should include a partial token on which the completion will be riggered.

setupCell.title: Code to run (notebook only)
setupCell.description: Code to run prior to invoking completer, e.g. `import numpy as np`. Only has an effect in notebook.

widgetPosition.title: Widget position in the layout
widgetPosition.description: Where to attach the editor widget in the layout
